name: Halfling Wars - Mobile RPG/Simulation Game
blurb: A free-to-play fantasy RPG/Simulation game. Raise & breed Halfling creatures for epic online battles.

rewards.reward: No Reward
DWARF BUNDLE: Custom Halfling Wars Desktop/Phone Wallpaper + Free Beta Copy of Halfling Wars on iOS + Thank-you E-card.
GOBLIN BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + $10 In-Game Starter Pack

WICKED MOJO BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + A Pair of Wicked Mojo Earbuds. (Retail $30). Wicked Audio donated these earburds. They're perfect for Gaming and Phone Use because they have a volume adjustment. Check out Wicked Audio's site and "Like" their Facebook. www.wickedaudio.com

YETI BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Downloadable Audio Soundtrack of Halfling Wars Music + Downloadable Poster + Access to the private discussion community with the game developers in a Q&A and Gamer Input Session once the game launches.
ORC BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + $20 In-Game Starter Pack + Game Credits Listing
EARLY CROW BUNDLE (The 1st 50 to Pledge $25 or More): Previous Rewards + Access to Hidden In-Game Quest + Limited Edition Halfling Wars Poster & Exclusive Darkling T-Shirt (Only 50 Ever Made)

FACE IN THE GAME BUNDLE: Previous Rewards except Early Crow Bundle + 1 entry into the Drawing to "Create and Name a Non-Playable Character" featured in the game. Make it look like you or anything else you dream up. ChondroStrike reserves final approval. 3 Winners will be randomly selected on February 1st.

WICKED AUDIO BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + A Pair of Black Wicked Audio EVAC Headphones ($60 Retail Value). Our friends at Wicked Audio donated their top-of-the-line headphones especially for our Kickstarter. The headphones are designed for an awesome music and gaming experience. Pledge now and check out their website here - http://www.wickedaudio.com/

IMP BUNDLE (ANDROID): Previous Rewards + Android Version of Halfling Wars. If we get 100 backers for this reward we will make Halfling Wars compatible with Android. + We'll throw in an extra $20 starter pack (takes 20-40 hours to get). So you'll get Android, $20 starter pack, $10 starter pack, and another $20 starter pack plus all the rewards above, except the Early Crow Bundle. (See FAQ for explanation of starter packs).
ELF BUNDLE: Previous Rewards Except Early Crow Bundle + "The Making of Halfling Wars" Digital Art Book + "The Making of Halfling Wars" Downloadable Video
BARBARIAN BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + 1 Light Power Shrine to Add Buffs to Your Light Creature and Boost It's Power (Only Available on Kickstarter!)
THIEF BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + 1 Dark Power Shrine to Add Buffs to your Dark Creature and Boost it's Power. (Only Available as a Reward on Kickstarter, Not in the Game Otherwise!)
TROLL BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + 2 Halfling Wars Rubber Bracelets + 1 Halfling Wars T-Shirt (Choose From 3 Designs) + 8 x10 Signed Print of Artwork

JAYBIRD BLUEBUDS X BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Jaybird Sport BlueBuds X Bluetooth Headphones with Battery HD ($169 Retail Value). These wireless headphones were donated by our friends at Jaybird Sport and are the Official Training Headphones of the USA Triathlon. So they're the best for athletes. There's only one pair, so act fast! Check out their website here - www.jaybirdgear.com
HALFLING BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Printed Hard Copy of "Halfling Wars" Art Book + "The Making of Halfling Wars" Collector's Edition DVD with Exclusive Cover Art + Custom Halfling Wars iPhone Case

WIZARD BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Design and Name 1 LIGHT CREATURE with the developers and lead artist (Darrin Perry) that gamers use in battle + 1 Original POSTER of The Creature You Design, Signed by The Halfling Wars Team. (Only available as a Kickstarter Reward and nowhere else!)

NECROMANCER BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Design and Name 1 DARK CREATURE with the developers and lead artist (Darrin Perry) that gamers use in battle + 1 Original POSTER of The Creature You Design, Signed by The Halfling Wars Team. (Only available as a Kickstarter Reward and nowhere else!)
DARKLING BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Exclusive Halfling Wars Hoodie + Halfling Wars Original Artwork drawn just for you and signed by Darrin Perry, the artist + Halfling Wars Playing Cards

GAME DEVELOPERS BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + A Link to your iOS/Android Game in the "More Games" screen of Halfling Wars. We're selling exactly 3 of these spots in total, but the price will go up with each one committed. Get in early!

DRAGON BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + Your Face in the Game as a Character + Original Signed Artwork with Your Face on the Character + Featured Link/Advertisement on Website (Approved by Chondrostrike) + Executive Producer Credit in Game and on IMDB

GAME DEVELOPERS BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + A Link to your iOS/Android Game in the "More Games" screen of Halfling Wars. We're selling exactly 3 of these spots in total, but the price will go up with each one committed. Get in early!

GAME DEVELOPERS BUNDLE: Previous Rewards + A Link to your iOS/Android Game in the "More Games" screen of Halfling Wars. We're selling exactly 3 of these spots in total, but the price will go up with each one committed. Get in early!
